

```{dot}
digraph TrafficLights {
    overlap = false
    node [shape=box]; atoll;
    node [shape=ellipse];
    atoll->presence;
    pcs->presence;
    genus->presence;
    nestingtype->presence;
    species->presence;
    species->genus;
    species->nestingtype;
}
```

Let the predicted presence P of species s of genus g and nesting type n on atoll a be:

# Random intercept only
$$
\begin{equation}
\begin{split}
\begin{aligned}

P_{as} &= \beta_{0a} + \epsilon_{as}\\
\beta_{0a} &= \gamma_{00} + U_{0a}

\end{aligned}
\end{split}
\end{equation}
$$

# Random intercept and species
$$
\begin{equation}
\begin{split}
\begin{aligned}

P_{as} &= \beta_{0a} + \beta_{1s}(Species_s) + \epsilon_{as} \\ %% check notation for index coefficients (beta1s)
\beta_{0a} &= \gamma_{00} + U_{0a}

\end{aligned}
\end{split}
\end{equation}
$$

# Random intercept and species and PCs

$$
\begin{equation}
\begin{split}
\begin{aligned}

P_{as} &= \beta_{0a} + \beta_{1s}(Species_s) + \beta_{2s}(PC1) + \dots + \beta_{7s}(PC6) + \epsilon_{as} \\
\beta_{0a} &= \gamma_{00} + U_{0a}

\end{aligned}
\end{split}
\end{equation}
$$

# Random intercept and species and PCs interacting with nesting type

$$
\begin{equation}
\begin{split}
\begin{aligned}

P_{asn} &= \alpha_{a} + \beta_{s}(Species_s) + \theta_{1s}(PC1) \times \gamma_{1s}(Nesting_n) + \dots + \theta_{6s}(PC6) \times \gamma_{6s}(Nesting_n) + \epsilon_{as} \\
\beta_{0a} &= \gamma_{00} + U_{0a}

\end{aligned}
\end{split}
\end{equation}
$$
